SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AbsoluteParentContextPathStrategy
ContextPathStrategy that detects context paths by absolute parent levels of a context resource.
AemConfigurationInjectResourceDetectionStrategy
AEM-specific implementation of ConfigurationInjectResourceDetectionStrategy.
ConfigurationReferenceProvider
This implementation of ReferenceProvider allows to resolve references of a given Resource to context-aware configurations.
CoreCompReferenceProviderDisabler
With Adobe Core Components 2.12.0, an own implementation of a context-aware reference provider was added to the core components.
PagePersistenceStrategy
AEM-specific persistence strategy that has higher precedence than the default strategy from Sling, but lower precedence that the persistence strategy that is part of AEM since version 6.3.
RequestHeaderConfigurationOverrideProvider
Provides configuration override strings from current request header.
RootTemplateContextPathStrategy
ContextPathStrategy that detects context paths by matching parent pages against a list of allowed templates for context root.
ToolsConfigPagePersistenceStrategy
AEM-specific persistence strategy that gets only active if a context path is redirected to path /content/...
